comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This is a variant of this photograph: "Mrs. Norman De R. Whitehouse (LOC)" by Bain News Service

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This Bain/LOC photo is dated December 30, 1913. A few weeks later, in January, 1914, Mrs. Norman Whitehouse, an American Suffragette leader, was presented by the American Ambassador, to Kaiser Wilhelm II, at the German court in Berlin. {In August, 1914, WWI broke out.} New York Times story, January 18, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A07E4D81F3BE6... Mr. and Mrs. Norman DeR. Whitehouse on board a ship in New York harbor -- a Bain News Agency photo dated January 23, 1914: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4787373518/]
